short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block sites/images/videos/ads from showing up on Google Search results based on URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of seeing the same AI-generated blogs, SEO-optimized sites, and spamming marketing webshops? Search Sanitizer blocks unwanted URLs from showing up in your Google Search results. Just enter the URLs you want to block, and theyâ€™ll be filtered out of your search results, including images, videos, ads, recipes and news articles.

Search Sanitizer is an open source project. Want to contribute?
https://github.com/spaansba/Search-Sanitizer
